author: Special Correspondent
text:
Man robbed

A manager of a private firm was robbed at knifepoint by two men in a motorcycle near Nice Road on Friday. Guru Murthy, a resident of Hosur, was on his way home on a bike with Rs 1.93 lakh in cash. Around 6.30 p.m., he pulled up to the kerb to answer a phone call.

While he was talking, two bike-borne men grabbed the bike’s keys, opened the box and took off with the cash.
title: Armed men rob manager
